name: Concrete Brutalist
prompt: A VibeDeck controller made of raw poured concrete, brutalist architecture style. Heavy, monolithic, gray concrete with visible form marks and aggregate texture. Buttons are pressed into the concrete as geometric shapes. The rotary knob is a smooth concrete cylinder. Minimal, industrial, museum sculpture aesthetic. The LCD screen is recessed into the concrete block. Dramatic shadows, architectural photography style.
why: Bold statement piece, appeals to architects/designers
